thread.title: BRIEF-Dropbox Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $500 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dropbox Inc Files For IPO Of Up To $500 Mln
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Dropbox Inc:
* DROPBOX INC FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $500 MILLION – SEC FILING
* DROPBOX INC SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NASDAQ UNDER THE SYMBOL “DBX”
* DROPBOX INC SAYS GOLDMAN SACHS & CO. LLC, J.P. MORGAN, DEUTSCHE BANK SECURITIES ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* DROPBOX INC SAYS ALLEN & COMPANY LLC, BOFA MERRILL LYNCH, RBC CAPITAL MARKETS ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* DROPBOX INC SAYS JEFFERIES, MACQUARIE CAPITAL, CANACCORD GENUITY ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* DROPBOX INC SAYS JMP SECURITIES, KEYBANC CAPITAL MARKETS, PIPER JAFFRAY ARE AMONG UNDERWRITERS TO IPO
* DROPBOX INC SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE
* DROPBOX SAYS THIS IS AN INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK OF DROPBOX, INC.
* ‍DROPBOX REPORTS 2017 LOSS PER SHARE $0.38​ * DROPBOX REPORTS 2017 ARPU $111.91 VERSUS $110.54 IN 2016‍​
* DROPBOX SIGNED OVER 100 MILLION REGISTERED USERS SINCE THE BEGINNING OF 2017‍​
* DROPBOX SAYS CO HAS THREE CLASSES OF AUTHORIZED COMMON STOCK, CLASS A COMMON STOCK, CLASS B COMMON STOCK, AND CLASS C COMMON STOCK‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2HISTH8 )
